description:
Yukimori Ringo is an energetic elementary school girl. Today she is helping her father sell apple pies at the concert hall where Wish’s concert is being held. Ringo adores Wish. As Ringo could not get a ticket, she tries to bring a gift apple pie to Wish, but the security personnel through her out. Despite all that, she still manages to get in somehow and meets Sasahara Natsuki and Takashiro Leila. Then three strange animals appear…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プリンセスみーつけた☆ぷりっ!
